data.eml:eml: Review of genus Hydropsyche Pictet 1834 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pandher, Manpreet S., Kaur, Simarjit, Parey, Sajad H., Saini, Malkiat S. (2017): Review of genus Hydropsyche Pictet 1834 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) from India. Zootaxa 4365 (3): 331-360, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4365.3.4
